vlive.korean: 공부 좀 해, 응? You should study. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [NCT] 나긋나긋의 긋은 GOOD이라면서요⁉️🥕 (DOYOUNG talking about songs)
일하고, 공부하고, 놀기도 하고 그랬겠죠? You must have been working, studying, and having some fun, too? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : 갑 겸 브
vlive.english: You must have been working, studying, and having some fun, too?

vlive.korean: 영어를 또 공부하시는... - 좋아하는 메뉴가 뭔가요? Because you're studying English... - What's your favorite menu? 듣기 View video BTS : 꿀FM <지진정의 R.A.D.I.O 라디오> #중대발표
vlive.english: Because you're studying English... - What's your favorite menu?

vlive.korean: 저는 공부를 안 했을 뿐 - 너는 고등학교가 좋았어, 중학교가 좋았어? I just didn't study. - Did you prefer high school or middle school? 듣기 View video ASTRO : 산랔 아점 냠냠😋
vlive.english: I just didn't study. - Did you prefer high school or middle school?

vlive.korean: [NCTzen - V LIVE 보면서 공부해도 돼요?] 방송 보면서 공부해도 되겠냐고요? [NCTzen - Can I study while I watch the video?] Can I study while I watch the video? Let's do that. 듣기 View video V PICK! : [NCT] 나긋나긋의 긋은 GOOD이라면서요⁉️🥕 (DOYOUNG talking about songs)
vlive.english: [NCTzen - Can I study while I watch the video?] Can I study while I watch the video? Let's do that.

examples.korean: We worked on pronunciation, stress and intonation. 발음듣기 우리는 발음, 강세, 억양에 대해 공부했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We worked on pronunciation, stress and intonation. 발음

examples.korean: The syllabus prescribes precisely which books should be studied. 발음듣기 교수요목은 공부할 책들을 정확히 규정해 놓고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The syllabus prescribes precisely which books should be studied. 발음

examples.korean: His burning ambition was to study medicine. 발음듣기 그의 불타는 포부는 의학을 공부하는 것이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His burning ambition was to study medicine. 발음

examples.korean: to do an MBA 발음듣기 경영학 석사 공부[과정]를 하다 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
Jane is studying law. 발음듣기 제인은 법학을 공부하고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
